čičo "Onkel" [a+m0m][12]; číčo "paternal uncle" [142]; či'čo "uncle:  brother of father"; či'čo "uncle" (and le'lja "aunt) are used when the more precise relationship is unknown and also to address adults in general [146]; čičo "uncle" (brother of father) (also used for other persons who are of the age of one's parents) [58:155]
